text: Tom Benny Lund (November 26, 1944 - October 16, 2000) was a Danish handball player who competed in the 1972 Summer Olympics. He played his club handball with Efterslægten. In 1972 he was part of the Danish team which finished thirteenth in the Olympic tournament. He played four matches and scored six goals. ==External links== *Tom Lund's profile at Sports Reference.com Category:1944 births Category:2000 deaths Category:Danish male handball players Category:Olympic handball players of Denmark Category:Handball players at the 1972 Summer Olympics
title: Tom Lund (handballer)
